thread.title: WSP: Financial and Valuation Modeling Boot Camp -- Chicago
thread.title_full: WSP: Financial and Valuation Modeling Boot Camp -- Chicago

author: AndyLouis
title: WSP: Financial and Valuation Modeling Boot Camp -- Chicago
text:
Wednesday, June 24 : Financial Statement Modeling Thursday, June 25 : Valuation and DCF Modeling Friday, June 26 : M&A (Accretion/Dilution) Modeling Online Courses : Excel Crash Course, LBO Modeling, Comps Modeling 
Live Seminar Highlights: 3 days of intensive Financial Statement Modeling, DCF , M&A & Excel Modeling Identical to large in-house analyst and associate training programs Taught by experienced practitioners (investment bankers, Equity Research Analysts , etc.) Includes comprehensive training manuals and model templates Qualifies for 27 CPE credits and 35 PD credits 
Dates: June 24th-26th, 8AM-5PM
